© O. Corcho, R.García-Castro, O. Muñoz-García
64
RDF and RDF Schema
Jena
• Java framework for building Semantic Web 
applications
• Open source software from HP Labs:
• The Jena framework includes:
– A RDF API
– An OWL API
– Reading and writing RDF in RDF/XML, N3 and N-
Triples
– In-memory and persistent storage
– A rule based inference engine
– SPARQL query engine
speaker: SYSTEM
